metadata.title: CVE-2021-47234 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: phy:phy-mtk-tphy: Fix some resource leaks in mtk_phy_init() Useclk_disable_unprepare() in the error path of mtk_phy_init() to fix someresource leaks.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
